name: 生物統計學
description: This course is designed to introduce undergraduate students to the basic concepts and modern applications of statistical methods commonly used in biological and ecological studies.
goals: Introduce to students the fundamental concepts and methods in modern biometry.
Develop students’ analytic ability and scientific attitudes towards hypothesis testing.
Provide trainings to students in scientific graphing and statistics software.
syllabus:
Week 1

以R軟體進行資料分析入門

Introduction to data analysis with R

Week 2

以R軟體進行科學繪圖入門

Introduction to scientific graphing with R

Week 3

機率分佈

Probability distribution

Week 4

樣本機率分佈

Sampling distribution 

Week 5

假說檢定

Hypothesis testing

Week 6

t檢定

t test

Week 7

期中考

Week 8

變異分析

Analysis of variance

Week 9

雙因子變異分析

Two-factor Analysis

Week 10

線性迴歸

Linear regression

Week 11

相關性分析

Correlation

Week 12

卡分適合度檢定

Chi-square goodness of fit

Week 13

期末考

Week 14

概念複習與個案示範

Concepts review & project demo

Week 15

期末報分組報告

Final project presentation 

\*本學期課程包含3週自主學習：學生以1-4人為一組，利用開放性生物學資料或個人一手生物學資料，提出科學問題、設計檢說與統計檢定、進行資料分析並於期末最後一週做口頭簡報。

\*The final project will require the students to spend another 3 weeks working independently outside the classromm in a small group setting (1-4 persons). Each student group will chose either open data or their own data to exercise the steps of proposing scientific questions, setting testiable hypotheses, analyzing data and communicating results in an oral presentation, which will be held at the end of the semester.

methodologies.note: Performining statistical analyses and graphic presentations using sample data sets
Powerpoint slides, videos and online simulation tools
